66914.<center>余は 第７代ウルベア皇帝ボラングムニス。\nそなたは 王者の座を:
I am Borangmunis, 7th Emperor of Urbea.
So you are the one who aspires the Seat of
the Sovereign...

66915.<center>余は 三闘士のハンマーを\nつねに 手元に置くことで 守ってきた:
I've always kept the Hammer close at
hand, protecting it. Yes...even now, after
I have long since departed from this world.

66916.<center>だが それも今日までのこと……。\n王者の座を目指せし者よ。\n:
But that ends today... To the one who aspires
the Seat of the Sovereign, I now bestow upon
you the Hammer of the Triad.

66917.<pc>は\n三闘士のハンマー（だいじなもの）を\n受け取った！<me 60>:
<pc> received
the Hammer of the Triad (Key Item)!<me 60>

66918.<center>かつて 大いなる災いが この地を襲いし時\n我らドワーフの民は:
Long ago, when a great calamity struck our
land... The Dwarves fought and were
the first to perish among the other races...

66919.<center>だが それは 無駄死にではない。\nドワーフたちの屍が築いた道は:
But this was not in vain. For you see, the
paths that their corpses paved eventually
became the path of the Sovereign.

66920.<center>……これで 余の役目も終わった。\nウルベアの民の待つ場所へと還:
Now my role here is finished as well... I can
finally join hands with the people of Urbea
once more. Farewell, Sovereign...

66921.「おお <pc>よ。\n 三闘士のハンマーと 三闘士のオノを\n ついに その手:
Oh, <pc>! I see that you've
acquired both the Triad's Hammer and
Axe at last.

66922.「……ほう。古代ウルベアの皇帝は\n 死後も 三闘士のハンマーを\n 守り続けて:
I see... So the emperor of the ancient Urbea
kept the Hammer close, even after his own
death...

66923.「おお……今は亡き ウルベアの皇帝よ。\n そなたの思い。同じく国を治める者とし:
Ohhh... Emperor of Urbea, now departed...
I understand your sentiments all too well,
as one who also governs a country...

66924.「……<pc>よ。\n じつは わしも ウルベアの皇帝と同じなのだ。:
As a matter of fact, <pc>...
I am the same as that emperor of Urbea.

66925.「いずれ 災厄が 世界を襲ったとき\n 王者の座を目指す者が 三闘士の盾を求め\:
As I grew, I was told that a time would come when disaster would strike this worldー that one who aspired the Seat of the
Sovereign would appear to claim the Shield of the Triad.

66926.「国王となったとき わしは 命に代えても\n この盾を守ると誓いを立て 以来\n:
When I became king, I swore that I would
protect this Shield with my life. I've kept
it with me ever since.

66927.「では <pc>よ。\n この三闘士の盾を そなたに授けようぞ！:
The time has come, <pc>.
I now bestow upon you the Shield of
the Triad!

66928.<pc>は\n三闘士の盾（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<me 60>:
<pc> received
the Shield of the Triad (Key Item)!<me 60>

66929.「三闘の神殿の入り口は ラニアッカ断層帯の\n オノの祭壇 ハンマーの祭壇 そし:
They say the entrance to the Triad Temple is within the Altar of the Triad, surrounded by the Axe, Hammer, and Shield Altars. It's in
the Raniakka Fault Zone.

66930.「三闘士の神器を持ち その祭壇を訪れれば\n 必ずや 三闘の神殿の入り口が開く！:
If you carry the three artifacts of the Triad
with you there, then surely the way to the
Triad Temple will open!

66931.「三闘士のハンマーと盾は 古代から伝わるもの。\n 時代を経て かなり 傷んでお:
The Hammer and Shield have both been handed
down since ancient times, and as such have
worn down over time. This is their final role.

66932.「見事 王者の盾を手に入れたならば\n わしのもとへ 戻ってきてほしい。\n 頼:
If you're able to obtain the Sovereign's
Shield, I'd like you to return here to me.
I know you can do it, <pc>!

66933.<cs_pchero>は 三闘の祭壇を調べた。:
<cs_pchero> examines the
Altar of the Triad.

66934.<cs_pchero>の持っている\n三闘士のオノ 三闘士のハンマー 三闘士の盾:
The Axe, Hammer, and Shield of the Triad
held by <cs_pchero> begin to tremble
as if resonating with one another.

66935.三闘士のハンマーと 三闘士の盾は\nボロボロに 崩れ去ってしまった……。: Both the Hammer and Shield crumble to dust...

66936.<cs_pchero>のもとに 天から\n光に包まれた武具が 降りてきた。:
Armor enveloped in a bright light descends
from high above...
